name: Mobin' Goblins
description:
Mobin' Goblins is a 3D tower-defense game set in a medieval voxel world. Protect the castle from invading waves of goblins to strengthen your defenses and save the realm!

Credits:

CONTRIBUTERS:
Zaynab Abdi
Devin Mikul
Carter Andrews
James Foti

UNITY ASSETS:
Forest - Low Poly Toon Battle Arena / Tower Defense Pack by AurynSky
Winter Forest - Low Poly Toon Battle Arena / Tower Defense Pack by AurynSky
Goblin and Cannon by VSQUAD
SimpleSky by Synty Studios

MUSIC AND SOUND EFFECTS:
"Menu Selection Click" by NenadSimic
"Air Horn" by Mike Koenig

"Determination" by artisticdude
"Jab" by Mike Koenig
"No Hope" by CleytonKauffman
"Lightstream" by Siddhartha
